mapper.sql: er_id, id, hospital, etime, eresult, registrant, rgtime, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into examination_register (id, hospital, etime, eresult, registrant, rgtime, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rgtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into examination_register
id,
hospital,
etime,
eresult,
registrant,
rgtime,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update examination_register
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
eresult = #{eresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registrant = #{registrant,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rgtime = #{rgtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where er_id = #{erId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update examination_register set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etime = #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, eresult = #{eresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registrant = #{registrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rgtime = #{rgtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where er_id = #{erId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.er_id,B.id,B.hospital, B.etime,B.eresult,B.registrant, B.rgtime,B.create_time,P.oldpeople_name from examination_register B inner join jd_oldpeople P on B.id=P.oldpeople_id
